analysis.key_quote: This proposal would allow tens of thousands of career civil servants to be reclassified into a new “Schedule P” category, stripping them of long-standing job protections and making them vulnerable to at-will firing.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based protections, due process rights, and the potential for increased politicization of the civil service, which aligns with the themes of nonpartisan governance and professional integrity.
